title: Watermelon, Feta and Mint Salad
ingredients: ['1/2 red onion, halved and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '600g (1 1/3 lb) seeded, cubed watermelon', '100g (4 oz) feta cheese, crumbled', '75g (3 oz) pitted Kalamata olives (optional)', 'handful chopped fresh mint', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
